titleStmt.title: The tryall of the nevv religion Contayning a plaine demonstration, that the late faith and doctrine of the Church of Rome, is indeede the new religion. By Thomas Bell.
titleStmt.author: Bell, Thomas, fl. 1593-1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by VVilliam Iaggard dwelling in Barbican,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
